name: Infiltradar
description:
Infiltradar is a short duration roguelike stealth game that is essentially the mini-map of typical stealth game. It's about as pure a 'stealth' game as can be.

Maneuver 'Agent Mark Arrow' to the top right of the map, avoiding the line of sight of enemies and cameras.

WASD or arrow keys to move
ESC/P to pause
CTRL to run (and increase enemy line of sight)
ALT to stop moving and hide in a box (decreasing line of sight)
